  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create a new notification handler"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/notification-handlers"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Create a new notification handler

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","example":"Bearer {api_key}"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"multipart/form-data":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the notification handler."},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["email","webhook","slack","discord","telegram","microsoft_teams"],"description":"The type of the notification handler."},"email":{"type":"string","description":"Email address (only for type=email)."},"webhook":{"type":"string","description":"Webhook URL (only for type=webhook)."},"slack":{"type":"string","description":"Slack webhook URL (only for type=slack)."},"discord":{"type":"string","description":"Discord webhook URL (only for type=discord)."},"telegram":{"type":"string","description":"Telegram API Token (only for type=telegram)."},"telegram_chat_id":{"type":"string","description":"Telegram Chat ID (only for type=telegram)."},"x_consumer_key":{"type":"string","description":"X Telegram API Token."},"x_consumer_secret":{"type":"string","description":"X Telegram API Token."},"x_access_token":{"type":"string","description":"X Telegram API Token."},"x_access_token_secret":{"type":"string","description":"X Telegram API Token."}},"required":["name","type"]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Notification handler created successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"example":{"data":{"id":1}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
